snippet: BRONSTEIN--Judith. The Board of Directors and staff of Plaza Jewish Community Chapel wish to express their sincere condolences to board member Rabbi Lester Bronstein on the loss of his mother, Judith Bronstein. May her memory forever be a blessing. Harold Handler, Chairman 1/3
lead_paragraph: BRONSTEIN--Judith. The Board of Directors and staff of Plaza Jewish Community Chapel wish to express their sincere condolences to board member Rabbi Lester Bronstein on the loss of his mother, Judith Bronstein. May her memory forever be a blessing. Harold Handler, Chairman 1/3
